content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2656.1 - Statutory authority

State Regulations

This Part is adopted and promulgated pursuant to the powers
granted to the New York State Division of Housing and Community Renewal by

Public Housing Law, section 14(a) and Real Property Tax Law, section
581-a. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2656.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
